trans-unit.source: Defines a segment of time that may contain child <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Define um segmento de tempo que pode conter subordinados <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: These child timelines become active according to their respective <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime*> properties.
trans-unit.target: Estas linhas cronológicas subordinados fiquem Active Directory, de acordo com os seus respetivos <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime*>Propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime*>

trans-unit.source: Also, child timelines are able to overlap (run in parallel) with each other.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, linhas cronológicas de subordinados são capazes de se sobrepõem (executar em paralelo) entre si.

trans-unit.source: ParallelTimeline objects can be children (nested inside) of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.
trans-unit.target: ParallelTimeline objetos podem ser subordinados (aninhados) de um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: This can provide better encapsulation of timing sequences in complex animations.
trans-unit.target: Isto pode fornecer a melhor encapsulamento das sequências de temporização no animações complexas.

trans-unit.source: ParallelTimeline has its own <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A> property therefore all child timeline <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A> values are relative to the parent ParallelTimeline value for <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A>.
trans-unit.target: ParallelTimeline tem o seu próprio <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A>propriedade, por conseguinte, todos os subordinados linha cronológica <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A>os valores são relativos ao valor de ParallelTimeline para <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A> principal</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline"></xref> class with the specified <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime*>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline"> </xref> classe com o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime*>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime*> especificado

trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline"> </xref> classe com especificado <> </> *> e <> </> *>.

trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline"> </xref> classe com especificado <> </> *>, <> </> *> e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior*>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior*>

trans-unit.target: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime*> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup"></xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime*>

trans-unit.target: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration*> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup"></xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration*>

trans-unit.target: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior*> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup"></xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior*>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: Cria um clone modificável deste <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline"> </xref>, efetuar cópias profundas de valores deste objeto.

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: Quando copiar propriedades de dependência, este método copia enlaces de referências e os dados de recursos (mas já não poderão resolver), mas não animações ou os respetivos valores atuais.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Este método é utilizado para produzir modificável cópias congeladas <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objetos (ou qualquer <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objeto).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Para sua comodidade, este método funciona como sombra a versão herdada por uma implementação com tipo seguro.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: Um clone modificável do objeto atual.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: O objeto clonado <> </> *> propriedade serão <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> , mesmo se a origem <> </> *> propriedade foi<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: Cria um clone modificável deste <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline"> </xref> objeto, tornando profundas cópias dos valores atuais deste objeto.

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: As referências de recurso, enlaces de dados e animações não são copiadas, mas são os seus valores atuais.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Este método é utilizado para produzir modificável cópias congeladas <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objetos (ou qualquer <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objeto).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Para sua comodidade, este método funciona como sombra a versão herdada por uma implementação com tipo seguro.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: Um clone modificável do objeto atual.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O objeto clonado <> </> *> propriedade serão <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> , mesmo se a origem <> </> *> propriedade foi <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of this <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância deste <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method overrides the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CreateInstanceCore%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método substitui o <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CreateInstanceCore%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CreateInstanceCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: The new <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The new <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Return the natural duration (duration of a single iteration) from a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolver a duração natural (duração de uma único iteração) a partir de uma determinada <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A natural duration is the period of a single iteration.
trans-unit.target: Uma duração natural é o período de uma única iteração.

trans-unit.source: If this method returns <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A> it means that the natural duration is unknown.
trans-unit.target: Se este método devolve <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A>significa que a duração natural é desconhecida.</xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A>

trans-unit.source: In this case, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.NaturalDuration%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> is determined by the author.
trans-unit.target: Neste caso, o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.NaturalDuration%2A>do <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>é determinado pelo autor.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.NaturalDuration%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, the duration of streaming media would be determined by the provider of the streaming media.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, a duração do suporte de dados de transmissão em fluxo seria possível determinar pelo fornecedor de suporte de dados de transmissão em fluxo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"></xref> to return the natural duration from.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"> </xref> para devolver a duração de natural.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Duration"></xref> quantity representing the natural duration.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Duration"> </xref> quantidade que representa a duração natural.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies how this timeline will behave when one or more of its <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline"></xref> children slips.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que especifica a forma como esta linha cronológica irão comportar-se quando um ou mais dos respetivos <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline"> </xref> slips elementos subordinados.

trans-unit.source: It is often desirable to synchronize animations and media.
trans-unit.target: Muitas vezes, é necessário sincronizar animações e suportes de dados.

trans-unit.source: However, this is complicated by the fact that media playback can be delayed by loading or buffering making it difficult to reliably play an animation along with media.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, isto é complicou pelo facto da essa reprodução de suporte de dados pode sofrer um atraso por carregar ou tornando difícil de forma fiável reproduzir uma animação juntamente com suporte de dados da memória intermédia.

trans-unit.source: The SlipBehavior property is used to determine what happens when media and animations are played together.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade SlipBehavior é utilizada para determinar o que acontece quando o suporte de dados e animações são reproduzidas em conjunto.

trans-unit.source: A value of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior> (default) specifies that animation timelines do not need to be synced and will play when specified regardless of the state of other media in the timeline.
trans-unit.target: Um valor de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior>(predefinição) Especifica que linhas cronológicas de animação não precisam de ser sincronizada com êxito e serão reproduzida quando especificado, independentemente do Estado de outros suportes de dados na linha de tempo.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior>

trans-unit.source: A value of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior> on the other hand, specifies that an animation will wait (slip) until media is ready to play.
trans-unit.target: Um valor de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior>por outro lado, especifica que um animação aguardará (slip) suporte de dados está pronto para reproduzir.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior>

trans-unit.source: The diagrams below illustrate this behavior.
trans-unit.target: Os diagramas abaixo mostram este comportamento.

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> plays a video and an animation.
trans-unit.target: Isto <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>desempenha um vídeo e uma animação.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: When SlipBehavior is set to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior> and the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A>, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> grows to play all media and animations.
trans-unit.target: Quando SlipBehavior está definida como <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior>e o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>está definido como <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A>, a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>cresce para reproduzir todos os suportes de dados e animações.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior>

trans-unit.source: ![Diagram: Key for SlipBehavior diagram](~/add/media/slipbehaviorkey.png "Diagram: Key for SlipBehavior diagram") ![Diagram: SlipBehavior property value of Grow](~/add/media/slipbehaviorgrow1.png "Diagram: SlipBehavior property value of Grow") This <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> has a SlipBehavior of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior> and a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration%2A> of 5 seconds which gives media and animations 5 seconds to play regardless of how much they slip.
trans-unit.target: ![Diagrama: A chave do diagrama SlipBehavior](~/add/media/slipbehaviorkey.png "diagrama: chave para o diagrama SlipBehavior")![diagrama: valor da propriedade SlipBehavior de medida](~/add/media/slipbehaviorgrow1.png "diagrama: valor da propriedade SlipBehavior de medida") isto <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>tem um SlipBehavior de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior>e um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration%2A>dos 5 segundos que lhe dá suporte de dados e animações 5 segundos para reproduzir independentemente quanto estes slip.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: ![Diagram: SlipBehavior property value of Grow](~/add/media/slipbehaviorgrow2.png "Diagram: SlipBehavior property value of Grow") This <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> has a SlipBehavior of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior>.
trans-unit.target: ![Diagrama: SlipBehavior valor da propriedade de medida](~/add/media/slipbehaviorgrow2.png "diagrama: de que pode aumentar o valor da propriedade SlipBehavior") este <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>tem um SlipBehavior de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DoubleAnimation> (and any other non-media children of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>) does not progress unless the media timeline is also progressing.
trans-unit.target: Tenha em atenção que o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DoubleAnimation>(e quaisquer outros suportes de dados não subordinados a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>) não avança, a menos que a linha cronológica de suporte de dados também é evoluir.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DoubleAnimation>

trans-unit.source: If the media takes a while to load, or if it is buffering, the animation will wait (slips) with it.
trans-unit.target: Se o suporte de dados demora algum tempo a carregar ou, se é a memória intermédia, a animação aguardará (slips) com o mesmo.

trans-unit.source: This allows animations to synchronize with a single media file.
trans-unit.target: Isto permite animações sincronizar com um ficheiro único suporte de dados.

trans-unit.source: ![SlipBehavior diagram for media and animation](~/add/media/slipbehaviorslip1.png "SlipBehavior diagram for media and animation") This <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> has a SlipBehavior of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior> and a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration%2A> of 5 seconds.
trans-unit.target: ![SlipBehavior diagrama para suportes de dados e da animação](~/add/media/slipbehaviorslip1.png "SlipBehavior diagrama para suportes de dados e da animação") isto <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>tem um SlipBehavior de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior>e um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration%2A>dos 5 segundos.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: In this scenario, the media file and animation are guaranteed to play for 5 seconds.
trans-unit.target: Neste cenário, o ficheiro de suporte de dados e a animação garantidos para reproduzir para 5 segundos.

trans-unit.source: ![Diagram: SlipBehavior property of a Storyboard](~/add/media/slipbehaviorslip2.png "Diagram: SlipBehavior property of a Storyboard") ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ![Diagrama: Propriedade de SlipBehavior de um guião gráfico principal](~/add/media/slipbehaviorslip2.png "diagrama: propriedade SlipBehavior um guião gráfico principal") # # informações de propriedade de dependência ||| |-|-| | Campo Identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`| Nenhum |

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates how this timeline will behave when one or more of its <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline"></xref> children slips.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que indica a forma como esta linha cronológica irão comportar-se quando um ou mais dos respetivos <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline"> </xref> slips elementos subordinados.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior*>

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: O identificador para o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.
